alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Jefferson Davis, southwestern Evangeline and southeastern Allen Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oberlin, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mamou, Kinder, Oberlin, Elton, Mittie, Allen Parish Airport, Harmony, Bond and Duralde. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
